faq_screen.q1_title: Do I need to pay anything in the app?
faq_screen.q1_answer: Downloading the app and most features are free. Payment is only required for consultations with a doctor. The payment amount is indicated in the doctor's profile before booking.
faq_screen.q2_title: How can I book a consultation?
faq_screen.q2_answer: You can book a consultation by selecting a doctor in the 'Find a Doctor' section, viewing their profile, and available booking slots. After choosing a convenient time, confirm your booking.
faq_screen.q3_title: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_screen.q3_answer: We accept payments with Visa and Mastercard bank cards. Payment details will be available during the consultation booking process.
faq_screen.q4_title: What doctors are available for consultations?
faq_screen.q4_answer: Our app features doctors of various specializations, such as traumatologists, pediatricians, gynecologists, ENT specialists, surgeons, cardiologists, dentists, and many others. A full list is available in the 'Find a Doctor' section.
faq_screen.q5_title: How does an online consultation work?
faq_screen.q5_answer: Online consultations are conducted via video communication. After confirming your booking, you will receive a link to a Zoom conference, which you need to follow at the appointed time.
faq_screen.q6_title: How much does an online consultation cost?
faq_screen.q6_answer: The cost of an online consultation depends on the doctor's specialization and the duration of the session. Detailed information about the cost can be found in each doctor's profile.
faq_screen.q7_title: Can I get a prescription online?
faq_screen.q7_answer: Yes, if permitted by your country's legislation and the patient's health condition, the doctor can issue an electronic prescription during an online consultation.
faq_screen.q8_answer: Yes, you can reschedule your appointment through the 'My Bookings' section in the app. Please note the cancellation/rescheduling terms, which may vary depending on the doctor.
faq_screen.q9_title: What if the doctor cannot accept me?
faq_screen.q9_answer: If the doctor cannot accept you, you will receive a cancellation notification. In such cases, we will offer you to choose another doctor or a different appointment time.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.reviewText: Booking a doctor takes literally a few seconds. Everything is clear, no queues, and I especially liked that you can immediately chat with the doctor. The interface is simple, the colors are pleasant. I recommend it to everyone who values their time!
